Mega wciągająca gra. poleciłem koledze, kupił, i gramy teraz na okrągło tylko w to. Jednak mimo wszystko trzeba czuć ten klimat, bo bez niego ta gra nie była by "pełna". Rozwijanie archiwum tylko wzbogaca rozgrywkę, przez co jest jeszcze bardziej wciągająca. Bardzo polecam spróbować.

밸런스 : 맞지않음. 대부분이 생존자에게 유리하며 이를 극복하는 수단이 너스와 블라이트라는 특정 살인마로 제한됨

재미 : 꾸준한 우하향. 꾸준히 핵은 발전하며 이를 잡을 방법이 없다고 공식적으로 발표함.
핵과 상술한 밸런스 문제로 생존자와 살인마의 비율이 어림잡아 8:2정도로 생존자의 매칭이 길다.
생존자 플레이 시 5분 큐돌리고 게임시작 20초만에 게임이 끝나는 광경을 볼 수도 있음

신규 유저의 유입은 줄어드는데 반해 고인물들이 점차 사라져가고있음
한국서버에 짱깨들이 70%를 차지하고 핵과 ESP가 판치는데 굳이 이 게임을 추천하고싶지 않음

The game is great. Really, it's fun if you have friends, and can be by yourself, too! But... It's a game with many bugs and horrible connection issues.  It's well known apparently as I've checked many forums.  The issue isn't just getting kicked out of no where, (and I have VERY good internet down and up and all around secure connection) the MAJOR problem.... is that you'll be BANNED for it.  Soft banned, sure, but why should someone be punished for a fault in the game? I paid to play your game, you messed up and now I can't play the game because of something you, as a developer, cannot or will not fix? That is very bad PR friends.

goxtei :3

Excuse me, i loved this game & play this game all the time with my friends but lately we have not been feeling the game and it mostly has to do with the hit boxes that killers have, like hitting people through windows/pallets/trees it makes no sense & it makes the game require little skill, i think these hit boxes need to be fixed on certain killers so the game can thrive. Also being camped needs to be fixed, there should be a range of where the killer needs to stand in order so the entity can begin to take effect & take the survivor or at least add perks to combat it because the ones out are very limited & sometimes even pointless like decisive strike -- no smart killer picks up a survivor after they get unhooked and downed. Fix this and i'll be satisfied and spend all my money in the game.

Покупаешь дбд, как стелс игру с целью избегать встреч с маном
@
Узнаешь ее поближе, понимаешь основы, ловишь дикий балдеж
@
Все сообщество нытиков называет ее помойкой, но ты играешь там с друзьями и вам весело
@
И ты тоже называешь ее помойкой, когда топор Ани попадает по тебе из-за камня, так как лучшие хитбоксы у нас в тумане
@
Более менее сосредоточено и серьезно играешь, выполняешь все поставленные цели
@
Спустя 280 часов берете с друганами 3 напролома и ящик, чтобы буллить мана и ломать крюки под носом
@
Это ты бегаешь за маном, а не он за тобой
@
В итоге для 20-ки это изи -4
@
Ловишь "гг изи"
@
Берешь в придачу осколок

10 повешенных кроликов фенг из 10

SAVE YOUR MONEY DO NOT PURCHASE

There are so many issues with this game that the developers have not addressed its just a money pit.

First off: Almost every game the killers camp the hooks so you cant be saved losing progress points, if you manage to get off someone else will get killed and camped at the hook. The developers have been silent about this issue that has plagued the game since its release. There is so many better design methods that are way better than the hook idea.

Second: Things like mend and saw traps, The issue with these are if the killer is next to you then your timer doesnt go down or you wont need to mend but the issue is the killer stays just out of radius but close enough to where u cant mend or try to get the trap off and tunnels you until you bleed out or die.

Third: The blood web its annoying to have to constantly click the blood web when there should be a button that selects all if you have enough points to complete the web.  This whole pick an item the next one disappears thing needs to go

Fourth: So many bugs totems getting bugged into walls or tractors and then if its fiery you cant do it. Or you go into a locker and it puts you outside the locker

Fifth: Killers hit radius if you like getting hit over a pallet, across the window, or even across the map the killers hit boxes are huge. I've been downed countless times watch a killer slash the wall only for it to connect to me a kill me. I had a killer chainsaw into a wall and i got downed behind the wood.

The game has lost its scary appeal its just a gen rush to the gates game now, they keep brightening the maps so its easier for the killer to see the black skinned characters like they thought we wouldn't notice.

Save your money there are better games coming.
